<title>Assessing the Cost of Implementing AI in Healthcare — ITRex</title>
<meta name="description" content="The costs of implementing AI in healthcare can be overwhelming. But you can control them by adjusting factors, such as infrastructure, model complexity, implementation method, and more. Check out our recent article to discover all the factors affecting the final AI price tag and look at projects from our portfolio." />

yoast_head_json.title: Assessing the Cost of Implementing AI in Healthcare — ITRex
yoast_head_json.description: The costs of implementing AI in healthcare can be overwhelming. But you can control them by adjusting factors, such as infrastructure, model complexity, implementation method, and more. Check out our recent article to discover all the factors affecting the final AI price tag and look at projects from our portfolio.
